CatDescriptText: Portion of article by Rusty Jones accompanying image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 1, 1946, pg. 10, reads: "Homewood Community - ...Claire Hall, who is attending Duquesne University, seems to be making a name for herself in field of music. Besides possessing a charming voice, she is also a talented pianist."
TitMainTitle: Three quarter portrait of Claire Hall wearing dark dress with three quarter length sleeves, and hairstyle with bangs, posed leaning on back of chair, in front of light colored background with opened dark curtains, in Harris Studio
